md:
giải nghĩa từ "decorators" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

**Decorators** (noun)

* Meaning: A person or thing that decorates or adds decorations to something.
* Vietnamese: Người trang trí, vật trang trí.
* Example sentence: The decorators worked all night to get the wedding hall ready for the big day.
* Related words: decoration, decorate, decorator.

**Decorators** (verb)

* Meaning: To add decorations or ornaments to something.
* Vietnamese: Trang trí, làm đẹp.
* Example sentence: The team of decorators decorated the entire house with balloons and streamers.
* Related words: decoration, decorate, decor.

In Python, **decorators** are a special kind of function that can modify or extend the behavior of another function. They are often used to add additional functionality to existing functions or methods without changing their source code.

* Meaning: A function that modifies or extends the behavior of another function.
* Vietnamese: Hàm trang trí, hàm bổ sung.
* Example sentence: The @timer decorator was used to measure the execution time of the function.
* Related words: function, modify, extend.
html:
giải nghĩa từ "decorators" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

Decorators (noun)

  • Meaning: A person or thing that decorates or adds decorations to something.
  • Vietnamese: Người trang trí, vật trang trí.
  • Example sentence: The decorators worked all night to get the wedding hall ready for the big day.
  • Related words: decoration, decorate, decorator.

Decorators (verb)

  • Meaning: To add decorations or ornaments to something.
  • Vietnamese: Trang trí, làm đẹp.
  • Example sentence: The team of decorators decorated the entire house with balloons and streamers.
  • Related words: decoration, decorate, decor.

In Python, decorators are a special kind of function that can modify or extend the behavior of another function. They are often used to add additional functionality to existing functions or methods without changing their source code.

  • Meaning: A function that modifies or extends the behavior of another function.
  • Vietnamese: Hàm trang trí, hàm bổ sung.
  • Example sentence: The @timer decorator was used to measure the execution time of the function.
  • Related words: function, modify, extend.
